dict.string: Hi! Welcome in the World of Meon. I'm going to teach you how to play. Now, tap anywhere on the screen.
The goal of this game is to finish all the 120 levels. To end a level, you have to free each Meon by lighting it with the right color beam.
Let's go to the first level. You can move green Meons. Tap on the green Meon and drag it toward bottom.
To free Meons, you can also use tools. On this level, use splitter tool to split your beam and free the two Meons Try to send your beam on the splitter

Good! It's easy, isn't it? To let you admire your good work, you can do a pause between each level: just go on the Options, in the main menu. Now, try to use the mirror to change your beam direction...
To free a colored Meon, you have to send a beam of the same color on it. You can use a Prism to create colored beams. Try to send a white beam on the white side of this prism.
Colored bricks can also be used to change your beam color. Can you reach the red Meon with a red beam?
To solve a level, you can use two hints. When you tap on “?”, the exact position of one tool is revealed. Try to tap on “?” now...
Ok, you're a master! If you're really blocked on a level, don't forget to use the solver. Now, try to free all the Meons. We are waiting for your help! Good luck!!!
